solution_line_template: In five years, Phoebe will be {phoebe_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{phoebe_current_age}+{years_in_future}={phoebe_age_future}>>{phoebe_age_future} years old.

If Raven is four times as old as Phoebe in fifteen years, he will be {raven_age_multiplier}*{phoebe_age_future} = <<{raven_age_multiplier}*{phoebe_age_future}={raven_age_future}>>{raven_age_future} years old in 5 years.
